#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

int a1[10]={1,5,4,0,5,1,2,8,9,9};
int a2[10]={1,7,8,4,9,5,6,2,3,3};
int main()
{

for(int i=1;;i++)
{
char s[32]="";
int n;
cin>>s;
if(s[0]=='#')
return 0;
n=atoi(s);
int t1;
if(n>=10){
t1=n/10 -1;
t1*=3;
t1+=9;
int t2 =n%10;
t1+=a2[t2-1];
t1%=10;
}
else t1=a1[n-1];
cout<<t1<<endl;
}
}
